tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE masked_data (
    mask_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    masked_username STRING,
    masked_email STRING,
    masked_phone_number STRING
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    ssn VARCHAR(20) MASKED WITH ('XXXXXXX-XX'),
    address VARCHAR(150) MASKED WITH ('XXXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX'),
    birthdate DATE MASKED WITH ('XXXX-XX-XX')
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PaymentDetails (
    payment_id INT,
    order_id INT,
    payment_date DATE,
    payment_method STRING,
    masked_card_number STRING
);

CREATE TABLE Address (
    address_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    street_address STRING,
    city STRING,
    postal_code STRING
);
